response.overview: Made in collaboration with Israeli artist and writer Osnat Haber. Fistula introduces a complex web of narratives, counterpointing the highly subjective account of a love affair between two women with a bricolage of film and video images. The image and ‘spoken’ computer-generated text exist together in an uneasy coalition, creating a series of possible correspondences which open out a space for associative and provisional readings. A fragmented visual text, identification, phantasy and gender create a dark subconscious space which is both disturbing and fascinating.
response.title: Fistula
